data.title: Chelsea Clinton welcomes baby No. 3 and her parents are 'so thrilled'
data.meta_description: Oh, baby does Chelsea Clinton have some news! The author and former first daughter announced the arrival of her third child Monday morning.
data.text:
Oh, baby does Chelsea Clinton have some news!

The author and former first daughter announced the arrival of her third child Monday on Twitter.

"This morning we welcomed our son, Jasper Clinton Mezvinsky," the only child of former President Bill Clinton and former secretary of state Hillary Clinton shared. "We are overflowing with love and gratitude and can’t wait to introduce him to his big sister and brother."

Chelsea, 39, married investor Marc Mezvinsky in 2010 in Rhinebeck, NY. Baby Jasper joins big siblings Charlotte, 4, and Aidan, 3.

The former first lady shared her joy on the social media site.

"Sharing some happy news this morning!" Hillary wrote, sharing her daughter's tweet. "Bill and I are so thrilled."

More: Tom Brady ripped for cliff diving with young daughter. The Rock says it gave him 'anxiety'

Chelsea revealed she and her hubby would be parents again in January on Twitter.

"Marc and I have loved watching Charlotte be such a wonderful big sister and we’re excited to watch Aidan become a big brother!" she wrote. "We cannot wait to meet our newest addition later this summer."

Chelsea is the author of several children's books. Her most recent, "Don’t Let Them Disappear," a picture book released April 2, is about endangered species and how to help preserve them.

Contributing: Hannah Yasharoff
